import React from 'react' import Icon1 from '../../images/svg-7.svg' import Icon2 from '../../images/svg-6.svg' import Icon3 from '../../images/svg-3.svg' import {ServicesContainer, ServicesH1, ServicesWrapper, ServicesCard, ServicesIcon, ServicesH2, ServicesP} from './ServicesElements'; /* To keep cards to the same size add line breaks
*/ const Services = () => { return ( Our Services Reduce expenses GuardMyPi is an open-source, free to use security software tool. Your only cost is the hardware you want to pair with it! Remote streaming You can access your GuardMyPi stream from anywhere in the world! Smart security With our ML algorithms GuardMyPi is convenient, hastle free and automated.


) } export default Services
